name: The Sun
description: The Sun represents success, radiance and abundance. It suggests joy and happiness in family, friendship, romance, and professional life. This card encourages you to have confidence in your path.

name: The Moon
description: The Moon symbolizes intuition, dreams, and the unconscious. It suggests a time of uncertainty and potential deception, urging you to trust your instincts. The Moon calls you to be guided by your inner voice.

name: The Star
description: The Star brings hope, renewed power, and strength to carry on. It's a card of inspiration, promising a time of calm and positivity. The Star suggests a period of spiritual tranquility and positive transformations.

name: The Lovers
description: The Lovers represent relationships, love, and togetherness. But it's also a card of decision making, indicating a strategic crossroad in life. The Lovers call for you to look at your choices carefully.

name: The Fool
description: The Fool stands for new beginnings, having faith in the future, and being unafraid to take risks. This card encourages stepping into the unknown with optimism and spontaneity.

name: The World
description: The World represents completion, achievement, and fulfillment. All of your efforts are finally paying off and you have reached the end of a journey or have completed a major life cycle.

name: The Hermit
description: The Hermit card symbolizes introspection, contemplation, and searching for inner guidance. This card often appears when you need to step back from the outside world and explore your inner experience.

name: Strength
description: Strength suggests not just physical abilities, but inner strength and the power of the human spirit. It stands for courage, determination, and inner resilience.

name: The High Priestess
description: The High Priestess represents intuition, mystery, and unconscious wisdom. She urges you to trust your instincts and listen to your inner voice.

name: The Emperor
description: The Emperor represents structure, stability, rules and power. He brings a sense of confidence and can suggest important achievements are on the horizon.
